name: saspes

scripts.build:dev:firefox: vite build ./ SAS_PES_development BUILD_MODE_firefox; echo 'Development Firefox build done.';
scripts.build:dev: vite build ./ SAS_PES_development BUILD_MODE_chrome; echo 'Development Chrome build done.';
scripts.build:prod: vite build ./ SAS_PES_production BUILD_MODE_chrome; echo 'Production Chrome build done.';
scripts.build:prod:firefox: vite build ./ SAS_PES_production BUILD_MODE_firefox; echo 'Production Firefox build done.';

author: Anvay Mathur and SAS PES Contributors
